scripts.build: rm -f /tmp/alexa.zip; zip -r /tmp/alexa.zip *.js node_modules/alexa-sdk node_modules/i18next* node_modules/lodash node_modules/node-fetch node_modules/encoding node_modules/iconv-lite node_modules/is-stream
scripts.upload: aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name GuildWars --zip-file fileb:///tmp/alexa.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload
